Primary Contact: Ian Gerbrandt, Interim Executive Director; Email: Ian@unitedwaycso.com
Service Details: - Demonstrates the power of group volunteering by connecting non-profit organizations with volunteer groups to complete a project- Projects such as planting a garden, cleaning up a park, organizing a playroom or painting an office help make the community a better place for everyone- Offers a great way to give back, build team spirit and make a positive, lasting change to the community- Volunteers gain insight into how the agency works to improve the community- Any day can be a Day of Caring
How to Apply: - Project lengths vary- Contact Ian to discuss your proposed group volunteer commitment or project requirements
Cost: - Volunteer groups CAN donate project materials, but this is NOT a requirement- Non-profits generally supply the materials needed for their project or arrangements are made to have them donated
Major Intersection: St Paul St and Bernard Ave
